mapper.select: SELECT c.member_uid, b.book_id, b.book_name, c.quantity, c.quantity * b.price as total_price, b.image_url FROM books b JOIN carts c ON b.book_id = c.book_id WHERE c.member_uid = #{ memberUid } AND b.is_deleted = false;

SELECT book_id, publisher_id, category_id, book_name, isbn, image_url, published_at, price, stock_quantity, created_at, modified_at, is_deleted FROM books WHERE book_id = #{ bookId } AND book_name = #{ bookName }
